originalTitle: People cling to treetops as 'worst floods in a generation' sweep Mozambique
title: People cling to treetops as 'worst floods in a generation' sweep Mozambique
content: The worst flooding in a generation hits Mozambique with teams from Brazil, South Africa and the UK helping with the rescue.

originalTitle: Kenya's ex-deputy president alleges assassination attempt in church attack
title: Kenya's ex-deputy president alleges assassination attempt in church attack
content: The interior minister condemned the attack, which police say they are investigating.

originalTitle: 'Half of my friends were killed' - the girls returning to a school caught up in war
title: 'Half of my friends were killed' - the girls returning to a school caught up in war
content: Twins whose classmates were killed by shelling say their deaths have made them determined to finish their studies.

originalTitle: Israel says Rafah crossing to open after search for last captive body ends
title: Israel says Rafah crossing to open after search for last captive body ends
content: Netanyahu's office says the border crossing with Egypt will reopen after search for soldier Ran Gvili's remains is over.

originalTitle: What’s behind the recent shift in US defence strategy?
title: What’s behind the recent shift in US defence strategy?
content: Washington has revealed its new national defence strategy.

originalTitle: Israel extends ban on Al Jazeera’s operations by 90 days
title: Israel extends ban on Al Jazeera’s operations by 90 days
content: Since May 2024, Israeli law has banned the network, citing threat to national security, an allegation Al Jazeera denies.

originalTitle: Video shows moments around fatal shooting of Alex Pretti in Minneapolis
title: Video shows moments around fatal shooting of Alex Pretti in Minneapolis
content: Bystander footage has captured the seconds before the killing of 37-year-old Alex Pretti.

originalTitle: Who was Alex Pretti, the intensive care nurse shot dead in Minneapolis?
title: Who was Alex Pretti, the intensive care nurse shot dead in Minneapolis?
content: He has been described as an avid outdoorsman who loved mountain biking.

originalTitle: Venezuela frees dozens of political prisoners, human rights group says
title: Venezuela frees dozens of political prisoners, human rights group says
content: It is the latest batch of detainees freed since the US seized Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro in a raid.

originalTitle: Cunha scores stunning late winner as Man Utd beat Arsenal
title: Cunha scores stunning late winner as Man Utd beat Arsenal
content: Two sensational second-half strikes give Manchester United a huge win that takes them above Chelsea and Liverpool into fourth.

originalTitle: Buendia scores screamer as Villa beat Newcastle
title: Buendia scores screamer as Villa beat Newcastle
content: Emiliano Buendia and Ollie Watkins both score as high-flying Aston Villa end their long wait for a St James' Park victory against Newcastle United.

title: Estevao-inspired Chelsea beat Crystal Palace
content: Estevao Willian replaces the injured Cole Palmer to inspire Chelsea to a comfortable win over Crystal Palace at Selhurst Park.
